item.title: Automatically Embed Latest Youtube Videos on your Website with JavaScript (step by step)
item.description: In this tutorial, youâ€™ll learn how to make an HTTP request to Youtube with the JavaScript fetch() method to dynamically embed new video on your website as you publish it on youtube.
